Flub.Name: Duration
Flub.Description: The number of breakage iterations to perform on the terrain. The default value should work in most situations.

Flub.Name: River Length
Flub.Description: The maximum length of each break or river.

Flub.Name: Erosion Power
Flub.Description: The strength of the breakage process. High values may cause sharp drops and spikes depending on the terrain.

Flub.Name: Seed
Flub.Description: The randomization pattern or seed for the node's process.

Flub.Name: Hard Cracks
Flub.Description: Disables antialiasing and smooth of the crack edges.

Flub.Name: Fast
Flub.Description: Processes faster, but may not always result in the same pattern of cracks.

Flub.Name: Accurate
Flub.Description: Processes a bit slower, but ensures the pattern remains the same.
